start.description: You are standing in a forest. Paths lead north and south.

forest_north.description: You are at the edge of a dark forest. There is a cave to the east.

forest_south.description: You are in a sunny clearing. There is a house to the west.

cave_entrance.description: You are at the entrance of a cave. It is dark inside.

house.description: You are at the door of a small house. It looks abandoned.

cave.description: You are inside a dark cave. You see some light in the distance.

inside_house.description: You are inside the house. It is dusty and quiet.

cave_deep.description: You are deep in the cave. There is a treasure chest here.

house_explore.description: You find an old map inside the house.
